headline: Equinix (EQIX): Reassessing Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Equinix (EQIX) has been sliding this month, with the stock down about 12% and roughly 23% year to date. That kind of pullback naturally raises the question: is this weakness justified? See our latest analysis for Equinix. With the share price now around $726.09, that 1 month share price return of minus 12.51 percent and year to date decline of about 23 percent suggest momentum is clearly fading, even though the 3 year total shareholder return of just over 13 percent still points to decent...
